meanings.definition: A shrub of the rose family with clusters of white or pink flowers and peeling bark.
meanings.sent1: The ninebarks in our garden have beautiful pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a cluster of white flowers on the ninebarks near the fence.
meanings.sent3: The ninebarks in the park seem to be showing off their lovely blooms.
meanings.sent4: The peeling bark of the ninebarks resembles delicate paper strips.
meanings.sent5: As I walked by, the fragrance of the ninebarks filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The dried bark of this shrub, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea using ninebarks for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist recommended a poultice made from ninebarks for the wound.
meanings.sent3: The potion made from ninebarks had an unexpected minty flavor.
meanings.sent4: The dried ninebarks were ground into a fine powder for the remedy.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the simmering ninebarks filled the room with a soothing scent.
